Episodes.Title: Ms. Knope Goes to Washington
Episodes.Plot: Leslie and Andy visit Ben and April at their new jobs in Washington D.C.. Ron throws a thank you barbeque for the entire Parks and Recreation staff.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Ben Zelevansky, Jessica Hansen, Lauren White, Amy Tolsky, Jenny Anne Hochberg

Episodes.Title: Soda Tax
Episodes.Plot: Leslie wages war on obesity in Pawnee by passing a city-wide soda tax. Andy tries to get in shape for his police entrance exam. Ben struggles to connect with the interns in his office.

Episodes.GuestStars: Helen Slayton-Hughes, Mary Faber, Kevin Symons, James Greene

Episodes.Title: How a Bill Becomes a Law

Episodes.Title: Ben's Parents

Episodes.Title: Women in Garbage

Episodes.Title: Ann's Decision

Episodes.Title: Emergency Response

Episodes.Title: Leslie and Ben

Episodes.Title: Bailout

Episodes.Title: Are You Better Off?
